verses.name: Joshua 3:1
verses.text: And Joshua rose early in the morning; and they removed from Shittim, and came to Jordan, he and all the children of Israel, and lodged there before they passed over.

verses.name: Joshua 3:2
verses.text: And it came to pass after three days, that the officers went through the host;

verses.name: Joshua 3:3
verses.text: And they commanded the people, saying, When ye see the ark of the covenant of the Lord your God, and the priests the Levites bearing it, then ye shall remove from your place, and go after it.
